ack.title: Acknowledgement
ack.p: This study was done in the frame of the cooperation with Nairian CJSC (Armenia).

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This study was done in the frame of Basic research support by State Committee of Science, Ministry of Education and Science of Armenia, to Yerevan State University.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The plant materials and methods used (see hereafter) were available upon request. All data obtained have been included into the manuscript.

sec.title: Authorâ€™s contribution
sec.p: AA collected plant material, obtained essential oils and identified chemical structure of essential oil components; AM contributed to manuscript preparation and improved English; MP identified plants, developed the methods and contributed to manuscript preparation; NS developed the methods and prepared the manuscript; AB tested the biological activities of essential oils and analyzed data; SA obtained essential oils and provided chemical analyses; AT supervised the study and edited the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the manuscript.

sec.title: Competing of interest
sec.p: The authors declare no commercial, financial or any other conflict of interest.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
